get.summary: List all AD Groups for a person (i.e. list of person's memberOf entries)
get.description: This can be used to retrieve a list of groups (showing their fully qualified name e.g. CN=S-group-G,OU-container,DC=doc,DC=root) from Active Directory by searching the container 'doc.root.internal'(by default) for the 'samaccountname'. It is not recursive. It does not require authentication.
